noun.description: A fan and follower of the rock group the Grateful Dead.
examples: the Deadhead hard core shadows the band, selling tie-dyes and beads

noun.description: A passenger or member of an audience with a free ticket.
A sunken or partially submerged log.

verb.description: (of a commercial driver, etc.) complete a trip without paying passengers or freight.
examples: trucks deadheading into California to pick up outbound loads

verb.description: Remove dead flower heads from (a plant) to encourage further blooming.
